item.title: Video Editor para Agencia UGC / Editor de Vídeos para Agencia UGC - Upwork
item.description:
¡Hola! Somos una agencia dinámica que se especializa en vídeos UGC y estamos en busca de un editor de video freelance talentoso y eficiente. Si tienes habilidades excepcionales en edición de video y puedes manejar proyectos con rapidez, ¡te estamos buscando!

Requisitos Obligatorios:

Capacidad para responder el mismo día de contacto.
Entrega del trabajo al día siguiente para volúmenes bajos de videos.

Responsabilidades:

Edición y montaje de videos cortos según las especificaciones.
Asegurar la calidad y coherencia del contenido visual.
Cumplir con plazos ajustados de entrega.

¿Qué necesitas?

Experiencia comprobable en edición de video.
Dominio de software de edición como Adobe Premiere, Final Cut Pro, o similares.
Excelente capacidad de manejar el tiempo y responsabilidad.
Experiencia en la creación de videos cortos para plataformas como TikTok e Instagram.

Hourly Range: $9.00-$15.00
Posted On: June 25, 2024 10:09 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Castilian Spanish
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Castilian Spanish
Country: Spain
click to apply

item.title: Rockstar marketing specialist to record an advertisement video for our company - Upwork
item.description:
Hello there! We are Everyday Translations.

Our company is just getting started and we need to start posting ads on Instagram and Facebook in order to start getting leads and also build a community.

We are looking for a person or a team that can record videos (reels/tiktoks) so we can have a lot of engagement on our social media.

We need someone who knows exactly how to write a hook, problem, solution and call to action so more people follow us and also to advertise our services.

Our only product is a translations service monthly subscription of $250-$350 and $800 per month.

We don't want to make videos only selling, we also want to create a community, so this is going to be a long term job.

Please share any ads you have made. We don't want templates or simple videos, we want real people talking.

Send us your quote per video. Remember this is going to be long term.

You'll take care of all the script, recording and editing.

Hourly Range: $14.00-$49.00
Posted On: June 25, 2024 09:51 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Mobile Advertising, Social Media Management, Video Production, Video Editing, Social Media Marketing, Facebook, Video Commercial
Skills: Mobile Advertising, Social Media Management, Video Production, Video Editing, Social Media Marketing, Facebook, Video Commercial
Country: Venezuela
click to apply

item.title: Looking for 2d Stick Figure Animator - Upwork
item.description:
I’m looking for an experienced animator to join my production team on a growing youtube channel.

Duties:
You’ll be given a voice-over audio file and a script with detailed animator instructions. Your job will be to create stick figure drawings, scenes, and animations to produce an engaging and fun-to-watch video.

Requirements to Apply:

- Adobe Animate, Premiere Pro
- Good English communication skills
- Artistic ability to copy a specific style of illustration
- Ability to draw quickly for a quick turnaround
- Attention to detail
- Good communication
- Be willing to ask questions to clarify instructions if you don’t understand
- Turn in work on time

The videos will need to be in a similar style as below.:

https://youtube.com/@serioushistory
https://www.youtube.com/@ChatHistory
https://www.youtube.com/@TrustMeBroOfficial

Application Process:
- Submit your application with examples of work.
- A sample will be required in the next step.

Start your application with “Stickman” to ensure that you have read the job post fully. We will share further requirements in the next stage.

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 25, 2024 09:51 UTC
Category: 2D Animation
Skills:Animated Explainer, Adobe Animate, Animation, 2D Animation, Video Editing, Explainer Video, Motion Graphics
Skills: Animated Explainer, Adobe Animate, Animation, 2D Animation, Video Editing, Explainer Video, Motion Graphics
Country: India
click to apply

item.title: Pro Video Editor Required | Premiere Pro - Upwork
item.description:
Job Title: Pro Video Editor

Company: Life Like Media

Location: Remote

Type: Freelance/Pay Per Video

---

About Us:

Life Like Media is a leading creative agency specialising in crafting high-performing ad creatives for scaling 7+ and 8-figure e-commerce brands. We pride ourselves on delivering top-notch professional videos that drive results for our clients.

---

Position Overview:

We are seeking a talented and experienced Video Editor to join our team. You will be working alongside one of our lead videographers, taking on the editing tasks for all the projects they shoot. Your primary responsibility will be to create professional, polished videos that meet our high standards and the specific needs of our clients.

---

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate with our lead videographer to understand project requirements and vision.
- Edit and produce 2x professional videos per client, ensuring high quality and consistency.
- Work efficiently to meet deadlines and manage multiple projects simultaneously.
- Integrate feedback from clients and internal team members to refine videos.
- Ensure all videos adhere to brand guidelines and project specifications.

---

Requirements:

- Proven experience as a Video Editor, with a portfolio showcasing your work.
- Proficient in video editing software ( Adobe Premiere Pro).
- Strong understanding of video production, storytelling, and pacing.
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
- Excellent attention to detail and commitment to producing high-quality work.
- Willingness to complete a trial video edit (all content provided) as part of the application process.

---

What We Offer:

- Competitive pay per video.
- Consistent work throughout the month.
- Opportunity to work on exciting projects for top e-commerce brands.
- Collaborative and creative work environment.

---

How to Apply:

If you are passionate about video editing and eager to join a dynamic team, we would love to hear from you! Please submit your application with the following:

1. A bit about yourself and why you would like to join our team, why we should choose you.
2. A link to your portfolio showcasing your best work.
3. Confirmation of your willingness to complete a trial video edit.

Once the application has come through I will DM you a link to your trial edit brief


Join Life Like Media and be a part of creating exceptional ad creatives that make a difference!

Budget: $200
Posted On: June 25, 2024 09:38 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Commercial, Color Grading, Audio Editing, Dynamic Transition, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Video Production
Skills: Video Commercial, Color Grading, Audio Editing, Dynamic Transition, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Video Production
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: B Roll Video for past event - Upwork
item.description:
I need a B roll video that will use footage from an event that was held last month. The video should show highlights from the event and different speakers.

If it can be a fast-paced video that swaps from video to video with bold text sections, highlighting the day - I will attach the brochure so you have the information. This video is primarily for use as sharing on social media to gain awareness of 'The Bulletproof Network Agency'.

All the raw footage can be found in Google drive here:

https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/16O-pBJ5_Zw38RbJ3bRmIys-_7__WVF6o?usp=sharing

Within the 'Camera' folder are all the main talks, please use mostly footage from the Sarah, Marianne & James talks. There are also snippets of video from Mariane and James in the' Iphone Videos' folder.

I've also added in the Bulletproof video Intro, logo and event brochure (for information of day). I've attached a word document with a brief outline of the content - happy for you to move these round with what works. I've attached an example corporate, upbeat, happy audio track to use - either use this or if you have a better one please feel free to use it.

Any questions please let me know. Thanks

Budget: $30
Posted On: June 25, 2024 09:33 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Youtube Videos created from AI Generated images. - Upwork
item.description:
I have a YouTube channel that is based on African folktales. I need a video producer/editor to create AI-generated images for my African folktale stories.

- I will provide the written story in PDF format and the audio for captioning
- Stories are generally less than 15 mins
- Soundtrack and sound effects should be included
- Thumbnails
- I will provide the intro and outro

Images must be of high quality, rich and express the stories excellently.

My channel: https://www.youtube.com/@MamaAfricasKingdomTales/videos

Images must be consistent with the videos already uploaded.

item.title:
Caption and Content Quality Reviewer
- Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a meticulous and creative individual to review and enhance the captions for our YouTube and TikTok videos. The ideal candidate will ensure that captions are free from spelling mistakes and editing errors, and also assess the overall quality of the content to ensure it is engaging and aesthetically pleasing.

Key Responsibilities:

Review and edit captions for all YouTube and TikTok videos for


accuracy in spelling, grammar, and punctuation.
Evaluate video titles, designs, and content to ensure they meet high aesthetic standards and are engaging for the audience.
Provide constructive feedback on how to improve video quality and engagement.
Collaborate with the content creation team to maintain consistent quality and appeal.

Qualifications:

Excellent command of English, with strong grammar and spelling skills.
Previous experience in proofreading, editing, or a similar role.
Strong aesthetic sense and ability to judge the visual and engaging quality of videos.
Ability to work under tight deadlines.
Familiarity with YouTube and TikTok platforms is a plus.

Please  review the videos from our Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/madisonprofitacademy/ and highlight any problems you notice and suggest improvements to demonstrate your aesthetic sense.

Hourly Range: $3.00-$5.00
Posted On: June 25, 2024 09:25 UTC
Category: Manual Transcription
Skills:Subtitles, Caption, English, Video Editing, Testimonial Video, Screencasting Video, Video Commercial, Content Writing, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Subtitles, Caption, English, Video Editing, Testimonial Video, Screencasting Video, Video Commercial, Content Writing, Video Post-Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Create white noise videos - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for a sound designer who can create white noise videos for me.

It's really simple, here is an example channel:

https://www.youtube.com/@SleepWhiteNoise3/videos

What to do:

1. create white noise
2. create intro and then black screen (can be low fps)
3. upload the video to YouTube with a thumbnail, title


payment per video: $5 dollar
Videos per day: 2
Videos per month: 61
Total payment per month: $310 dollar

item.title: Female Video Presenter to Create a Green Screen Video for a Legal Services Company. - Upwork
item.description:
Location: Location not importand
Age Range: 35-50  
Project Type: Video Presentation  

About the Project:
We are looking for an experienced and professional female video presenter to supply a completed green screen video  to represent our legal services company. The Green Screen will be used to create an AI video avatar on the HeyGen platform or a similar service.

Role Requirements:
-Gender: Female
- Age: 35-50
- Nationality: Australian
- Appearance: Professional, trustworthy, and approachable
- Skills: Excellent verbal communication, clear and authoritative voice, confident on-camera presence
- Experience: Prior experience in presenting, especially in the legal or corporate sectors, is highly desirable

Details:
- Work Type: Remote video recording
- Duration: Approximately 3-4 minutes of scripted content
- Usage:Online AI video avatar for promotional and informational purposes
- Delivery: High-quality video and audio recording

Responsibilities:
- Deliver a clear and engaging presentation based on the provided script
- Ensure professional appearance and setting for the recording
- Follow guidelines to ensure high-quality video and audio output

How to Apply:
If you meet the criteria and are interested in this task, please submit your application through with the following:
1. Headshot and Professional Photo
2. Video Samples Links to previous work showcasing your presenting skills
3. Voice Sample: A short audio clip demonstrating your speaking abilities
4. Availability: Please confirm the delivery time

We are excited to find the right presenter to be the face and voice of our legal services company!

We would be pleased to answer any questions you may have.
Thank you!


Budget: $300
Posted On: June 25, 2024 09:15 UTC
Category: Acting
Skills:Australian English Dialect, Acting, Female, Middle-Aged Adult, Senior Adult, Video Production, Explainer Video, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Australian English Dialect, Acting, Female, Middle-Aged Adult, Senior Adult, Video Production, Explainer Video, Video Post-Editing
Country: Australia
